Articles.Content:
My son wants to say:

Quote

I have bettertimewarpcontinued, FMRScontinued and their dependencies installed.

I can't find the KAL1000controller. I use 1.11.1 . The problem did only appear in 1.11.1 and breakingground was already installed when I had 1.11.0 . I did not edit any craft files. I also want to say, I have the picture of the KAL1000controller in the science section, but the name is CRSYscanningarm. This only happens with breaking ground pieces and only in 1.11.1 , but it works in 1.11 . Does this mean I did not install breakingground correctly or is it a bug in 1.11.1 breakingground.

If you got KSP via Steam, verify the game files first and see if that resolves the problem. If not, try reinstalling Breaking Ground- delete the folder KSP/GameData/SquadExpansion/Serenity and re-download Breaking Ground from wherever you got it. If that still doesn’t work, copy your save games (in KSP/saves) to the desktop, completely uninstall KSP then reinstall it from scratch- remember to put your saves back afterwards.
